overview: To the rhythm of a frenzied choreography, acrobatic matches come to life on a black background.  Leaving their matchbox, they line the film in circular, concentric movements.  In an almost aquatic momentum, the squadron of little bits of wood mould the contours of a character, a run-of-the-mill smoker, before transforming into a funny harness.  The film ends when the matches, again transformed, take on the appearance of a distinguished man who, after several attempts, finally finds a way of lighting his cigarette.
title: Fancy Matches
